coding_practice.title: Find All Anagrams in a String
coding_practice.description: Given two strings s and p, return an array of all the start indices of p's anagrams in s. You may return the answer in any order.

examples.explanation:
The substring with start index = 0 is "cba", which is an anagram of "abc".
The substring with start index = 6 is "bac", which is an anagram of "abc".

The substring with start index = 0 is "ab", which is an anagram of "ab".
The substring with start index = 1 is "ba", which is an anagram of "ab".
The substring with start index = 2 is "ab", which is an anagram of "ab".

coding_practice.constraints:
1 <= s.length, p.length <= 3 * 10^4
s and p consist of lowercase English letters.
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 使用 Counter 記錄 p 的字符出現次數 p_count。
2. 初始化窗口 s_count 為 s 的前 np 個字符。
3. 如果窗口與 p_count 相等，將起始索引加入結果。
4. 滑動窗口，每次刪除窗口最左字符，加入新右字符，並檢查是否與 p_count 相等。
5. 返回所有符合條件的起始索引列表。
